turns.seeker_message: It's hard to explain everything... but lately, I feel like I've disappointed my family. The guilt won't let me sleep, and even my tea rituals feel pointless. I used to find peace in calligraphy, but now I can't even pick up the brush.

You're carrying so much, and I can see how the sleep disturbance and weight loss fit into this pattern of suffering.
